message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.MM

This paper deals with human pose forecasting using recurrent neural networks, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG). The proposed method also involves modeling the hierarchical and multi-scale characteristics of human dynamics, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the potential applications of this work in robotics (cs.RO) and health-care (cs.MM) make these sub-categories likely as well.
